item.title: New Zealand's Otherworldly Landscapes
item.description:
New Zealand's Otherworldly Landscapes

If you flew south over these South Island alps and then carried on over the Pacific, your next sighting of land would be Antarctica. This view of the alps, from Blanket Bay lodge, was shared by some of the stars of the Lord of the Rings trilogy, who stayed here while filming.

item.title: Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike
item.description:
Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike

Conceptual Bike - Ion Lucin has simplified the design of a standard two-wheeler with his conceptual bike Baik that opts for three-spoked wheels, a limited use of lin...

item.title: There & Back Again: A Cross-Country Epic
item.description:
There & Back Again: A Cross-Country Epic

It's usually late February or early March when I load up my vehicle with tools of photographic wonder to embark on a journey from Asheville, NC into the unknown and across the U.S. Destination: Las Vegas. WPPI to be exact, where I have been an educator there since 2002.

item.title: The Coolest Tech at SXSW Interactive This Year
item.description:
The Coolest Tech at SXSW Interactive This Year

Everything from lifelike humanoids to VR-recording apps at SXSW Interactive 2016.
